muxi.payservices.service

Class MPSManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • muxi.payservices.service.MPSManager

  • public class MPSManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for communication with POSWEB Pay Services. It sends the command to start service, stop service, init POSWEB Pay Services and make payment. It is also is this class that is receipt the answer from service about success or errors of these commands.

      • deconfigure

        public void deconfigure(boolean ignore)
        Realiza a desconfiguracao da biblioteca, levando-a ao estado inicial de instalacao.
        Parameters:
        ignore - - parametro que indica se havera o processamento de transacoes pendentes, podendo assumir os valores: true: faz a desconfiguracao mesmo que existam transacoes pendentes false: so faz a desconfiguracao se nao existirem transacoes pendentes, caso contrario retorna erro
        Since:
        version 1.00b01

      • stopService

        public void stopService(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Method used to call stop service. It is used to break a service connection with POSWEB Pay Services
